alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Garfield; Kingfisher; Logan; Major; Roger Mills; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:14AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kingfisher, Ellis, Roger Mills, Custer, Blaine, northwestern Logan, Dewey, western Garfield, Major and southern Woodward Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 113 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Waukomis to 4 miles north of Putnam to 10 miles southeast of Higgins. Movement was southeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Enid, Watonga, Kingfisher, Fairview, Shattuck, Cheyenne, Arnett, Taloga, Hennessey, Crescent, Waukomis, Okeene, Thomas, Seiling, Arapaho, Vici, Canton, Lahoma, Hammon, and Ringwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Garfield; Kingfisher; Logan; Major; Roger Mills; Woodward
